content.prompt:
Listen to the scale.


Which of the following statements best describes the pitches of the scale that is played?

choices.label: All the pitches are diatonic to the major scale.
Except the starting pitch, all of the pitches of the major scale are chromatically altered.
Most of the pitches are diatonic to the major scale, but several pitches are chromatically altered.
Most of the pitches are diatonic to the major scale, but one pitch is chromatically altered.

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Use symbols and terms to describe features of pitch in performed music, including pitch patterns and relationships, melodic features, chords, harmonic progressions, and cadences.
